components.name: hekEyM
components.content:
In this section, we'll ask about:
  • how your proposed project is innovative
  • how the project has the potential to be scaled up or replicated on a wider scale

pages.title: How is the proposed project innovative?

components.name: sUnJxQ
components.content:
To be deemed 'innovative', the project must:
  • introduce new or significantly improved approaches, technologies or partnerships to enhance tenant outcomes and improve overall resident experience
  • challenge conventional practices across the sector more widely and respond creatively to tenant needs

The grant can be used to expand or build upon an existing project, but cannot be used to fund business as usual activities.

components.name: WJTBzi

pages.title: How does this project have the potential to be scaled up or replicated on a wider scale?

components.name: MqUCdE
components.content: Describe how the learnings from this project could have benefits for social housing tenants more broadly across the country.
